skillTree.name: Beast of Suiddock
skillTree.description: For years the grisly murders that haunted the dockyards of Marienburg were ascribed to a figure nicknamed the Suiddock Beast. Mundvard's Pet terrorgheist.

effects.description: Mount: Beast of Suiddock

skillTree.name: Dark Pact
skillTree.description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when attacking
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Grip of Immorality
skillTree.description: For centuries Mundvard has ruled the underworld of the Wasteland. Calculating, plotting and consolidating immense power and wealth.

effects.description:
Growth: +20
	(local province)

Control: -5
	(local enemy province)
Passive ability: "The Hunger"

skillTree.name: Impermeable Shadow
skillTree.description: Mundvard moves softly, fights slippery and treads elusive. Still the veins running through his wing are coursing with dark magic, making it harder than the thickest stone.

effects.description: Armour: +10
Ward save: 5%

skillTree.name: Toast to Nepotism
skillTree.description: If the great merchant families that hold a seat in the directorate where not so busy squabbling amongst themselves, Mundvard might not have risen to such power. Profiting from Marienburg's corrupt nepotism at each step of the way.

effects.description: Request army cost: -30%
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Empire

skillTree.name: Lore of W'soran
skillTree.description: Mundvard is ancient, even amongst vampires - still devotely following the teachigns of W'soran the Wicked, the Father of Vampires. Awaiting Nagash's return with everlasting patience.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Vampires spells

Melee attack: +10 for embedded Vampire Heroes
	(own army)

skillTree.name: Dark Protection
skillTree.description: Those who watch proceedings from behind the veil of death may reach through to aid their disciples, when required to intervene.

effects.description: Ability: "Dark Protection"

skillTree.name: Ten Silverlings
skillTree.description: If magic, bloodlust and evasiveness fails - there is always the irresistible smell of gold. Humans flock around it like flies flock around a dead corpse. They turn on each other in a flash at the mere sight of silver, it's quite the sight.

effects.description:

	(factionwide)

Recruitment cost: -30% for Marienburg units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Passive ability: "Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.name: Aura of Supremacy
skillTree.description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: The Unliving Host
skillTree.description: "Arise my host, my Unliving minions - bring me victory!"

skillTree.description: "Can you hear it… the call of the night? Time for its children to arise and swarm."

skillTree.description: The Lord howls out into the night, and is answered by the baying of dark creatures.

skillTree.description: Vampires summon forth the gruesome remains of the ancient dead to bolster the masses of lesser minions under their control.

skillTree.name: The Restless Dead
skillTree.description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

skillTree.name: Undying Horde
skillTree.description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

backgroundSkills.name: Master of Shadows
backgroundSkills.description: He is Mundvard, Lord of Shadows, ruler of the underground and scourge of the Wasteland.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +10%
	(factionwide)
Ability: "Shadow Walk"
Miscast base chance: -15%
Ability: "Liberation of Souls"

items.name: Artifact of Anathema
items.description: With this ancient Artifact, souls taken by Mundvard are forced to wander and serve endlessly, prolonging his life with each taken soul. Sadistically, this artifact often disguises itself as a tool of excommunication. Mistaken by Witch Hunters and Priests of Sigmar as a instrument to root out evil, it instead latches on to it's wielder and manifests dark magic.

effects.description: Upkeep: -15% for Marienburg units
Recruit rank: +3 for Marienburg units

items.name: Hilaria om Klimt
items.description: Hilaria om Klimt is a strong-boned but not unattractive young woman in her middle to late twenties. She is 5ft 5in tall, and has slightly wavy black hair reaching down to the middle of her back; her eyes are the tint of onyx. ''Sister Hilli'' is known by everyone who frequents Suiddock, and is well liked by the poor in Marienburg. What they don't know however, is the secret she bares. For years she is serving the dark syndicate set up to feed the Lord of Shadows his information, and what better asset Hilaria is - in the dead centre of Marienburg's middle class society, perfect for grooming potential recruits for Lord Mundvard's cause.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10
Weapon strength: +10%
Ability: "Sword of W'soran"

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Cairn Wraiths

items.name: Sword of W'soran
items.description: A sword that has slain generations upon generations. All who fall victim to the cursed blade of the Sword of W'soran are trapped lingering the ethereal planes for eternity. Only the wielder of mighty relic has the power to unleash the spirits of the fallen. Upon doing so, hordes of wraiths storm the mortal planes ready to do their new master's bidding.

factionEffects.title: Criminal Mastermind
factionEffects.description: Ruling from the Shadows, Mundvard the Cruel plots and schemes his way to supreme reign over the Wasteland. Slaying, enthralling, consuming or even selling the weak men of Marienburg every step of the way.

effects.description: Establish criminal syndicates in hostile regions
This is a minor faction, experiences may differ from playing with a major faction.
Sell slaves to the highest bidder via rings of slave traffickers
Use lairs, burrows and tunnels to traverse the underground of the Wasteland
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Humans
Slaves: 50 per turn
